member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.AzureAppConfigurationExtensions
member.summary: This type provides helper methods to make common use cases for Azure App Configuration easy.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.AzureAppConfigurationExtensions.AddAzureAppConfiguration(Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfigurationBuilder,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds key-value data from an Azure App Configuration store to a configuration builder.
member.param: The configuration builder to add key-values to.
The connection string used to connect to the configuration store.
If true, this method will not throw an exception if the configuration store cannot be accessed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.AzureAppConfigurationExtensions.AddAzureAppConfiguration(Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfigurationBuilder,System.Action{Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.AzureAppConfiguration.AzureAppConfigurationOptions},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds key-value data from an Azure App Configuration store to a configuration builder.
member.param: The configuration builder to add key-values to.
A callback used to configure Azure App Configuration options.
If true, this method will not throw an exception if the configuration store cannot be accessed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.AzureAppConfigurationExtensions.AddAzureAppConfiguration(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection)
member.summary: Adds Azure App Configuration services to the specified .
member.param: The to add services to.
member.returns: The so that additional calls can be chained.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.AzureAppConfiguration.AzureAppConfigurationKeyVaultOptions

member.summary: Sets the credentials used to authenticate to key vaults that have no registered .
member.param: Default token credentials.

member.summary: Registers the specified instance to use to resolve key vault references for secrets from associated key vault.
member.param: Secret client instance.

member.summary: The connection string to use to connect to Azure App Configuration. If this property is set, the property also needs to be set.

member.summary: A collection of key prefixes to be trimmed.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.AzureAppConfiguration.AzureAppConfigurationOptions.OfflineCache
member.summary: An offline cache provider which can be used to enable offline data retrieval and storage.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.AzureAppConfiguration.AzureAppConfigurationOptions.Client
member.summary: An optional client that can be used to communicate with Azure App Configuration. If provided, the connection string property will be ignored.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.AzureAppConfiguration.AzureAppConfigurationOptions.ClientOptions
member.summary: Options used to configure the client used to communicate with Azure App Configuration.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.AzureAppConfiguration.AzureAppConfigurationOptions.Select(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Specify what key-values to include in the configuration provider. can be called multiple times to include multiple sets of key-values.
member.param: The key filter to apply when querying Azure App Configuration for key-values. The characters asterisk (*), comma (,) and backslash (\) are reserved and must be escaped using a backslash (\). Built-in key filter options: .

The label filter to apply when querying Azure App Configuration for key-values. By default the null label will be used. Built-in label filter options: The characters asterisk (*) and comma (,) are not supported. Backslash (\) character is reserved and must be escaped using another backslash (\).

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.AzureAppConfiguration.AzureAppConfigurationOptions.UseFeatureFlags(System.Action{Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.AzureAppConfiguration.FeatureManagement.FeatureFlagOptions})
member.summary: Enables Azure App Configuration feature flags to be parsed and transformed into feature management configuration.
member.param: A callback used to configure feature flag options.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.AzureAppConfiguration.AzureAppConfigurationOptions.SetOfflineCache(Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.AzureAppConfiguration.IOfflineCache)
member.summary: Use an offline file cache to store Azure App Configuration data or retrieve previously stored data during offline periods.
member.param: The offline file cache to use for storing/retrieving Azure App Configuration data.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.AzureAppConfiguration.AzureAppConfigurationOptions.Connect(System.String)
member.summary: Connect the provider to the Azure App Configuration service via a connection string.
member.param: Used to authenticate with Azure App Configuration.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.AzureAppConfiguration.AzureAppConfigurationOptions.Connect(System.Uri,Azure.Core.TokenCredential)
member.summary: Connect the provider to Azure App Configuration using endpoint and token credentials.
member.param: The endpoint of the Azure App Configuration to connect to.
Token credentials to use to connect.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.AzureAppConfiguration.AzureAppConfigurationOptions.TrimKeyPrefix(System.String)
member.summary: Trims the provided prefix from the keys of all key-values retrieved from Azure App Configuration.
member.param: The prefix to be trimmed.

member.summary: Configure the client used to communicate with Azure App Configuration.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.AzureAppConfiguration.AzureAppConfigurationOptions.GetRefresher
member.summary: Get an instance of that can be used to trigger a refresh for the registered key-values.

member.summary: Configures the Azure App Configuration provider to use the provided Key Vault configuration to resolve key vault references.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.AzureAppConfiguration.AzureAppConfigurationProvider.Load
member.summary: Loads (or reloads) the data for this provider.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.AzureAppConfiguration.AzureAppConfigurationRefreshOptions
member.summary: Options used to configure the refresh behavior of an Azure App Configuration provider.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.AzureAppConfiguration.AzureAppConfigurationRefreshOptions.Register(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Register the specified key-value to be refreshed when the configuration provider's triggers a refresh. The instance can be obtained by calling .
member.param: Key of the key-value.
If true, a change in the value of this key refreshes all key-values being used by the configuration provider.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.AzureAppConfiguration.AzureAppConfigurationRefreshOptions.Register(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Register the specified key-value to be refreshed when the configuration provider's triggers a refresh. The instance can be obtained by calling .
member.param: Key of the key-value.
Label of the key-value.
If true, a change in the value of this key refreshes all key-values being used by the configuration provider.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.AzureAppConfiguration.AzureAppConfigurationRefreshOptions.SetCacheExpiration(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Sets the cache expiration time for the key-values registered for refresh. Default value is 30 seconds. Must be greater than 1 second. Any refresh operation triggered using will not update the value for a key until the cached value for that key has expired.
member.param: Minimum time that must elapse before the cache is expired.

members.member: Uses the Azure Key Vault secret provider to resolve Key Vault references retrieved from Azure App Configuration. inputs the IKeyValue returns the keyname and actual value

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.AzureAppConfiguration.KeyVaultReferenceException
member.summary: The exception that is thrown when there is an error resolving a reference to Azure Key Vault resource.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.AzureAppConfiguration.KeyVaultReferenceException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the System.Exception class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
member.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) if no inner exception is specified. ///

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.AzureAppConfiguration.KeyVaultReferenceException.Message
member.summary: Gets a message that describes the current exception. Returns The error message that explains the reason for the exception, or an empty string("").

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.AzureAppConfiguration.KeyVaultReferenceException.Key
member.summary: The key of the Key Vault reference that caused the exception.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.AzureAppConfiguration.KeyVaultReferenceException.Label
member.summary: The label of the Key Vault reference that caused the exception.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.AzureAppConfiguration.KeyVaultReferenceException.Etag
member.summary: The etag of the Key Vault reference that caused the exception.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.AzureAppConfiguration.KeyVaultReferenceException.SecretIdentifier
member.summary: The secret identifier used by the Azure Key Vault reference that caused the exception.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.AzureAppConfiguration.KeyVaultReferenceException.ErrorCode
member.summary: The error code, if available, describing the cause of the exception.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.AzureAppConfiguration.FeatureManagement.FeatureFlagOptions
member.summary: Options used to configure the feature flags to be parsed.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.AzureAppConfiguration.FeatureManagement.FeatureFlagOptions.Label
member.summary: The label that feature flags will be selected from.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.AzureAppConfiguration.FeatureManagement.FeatureFlagOptions.CacheExpirationInterval
member.summary: The time after which the cached values of the feature flags expire. Must be greater than or equal to 1 second.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.AzureAppConfiguration.IConfigurationRefresher
member.summary: An interface used to trigger an update for the data registered for refresh with App Configuration.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.AzureAppConfiguration.IConfigurationRefresher.AppConfigurationEndpoint
member.summary: The App Configuration endpoint.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.AzureAppConfiguration.IConfigurationRefresher.RefreshAsync
member.summary: Refreshes the data from App Configuration asynchronously.
member.exception: An error occurred when resolving a reference to an Azure Key Vault resource.
The request failed with an error code from the server.
The refresh operation failed with one or more errors. Check for more details.
The refresh operation was invoked before Azure App Configuration Provider was initialized.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.AzureAppConfiguration.IConfigurationRefresher.TryRefreshAsync
member.summary: Refreshes the data from App Configuration asynchronously. A return value indicates whether the operation succeeded.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.AzureAppConfiguration.IConfigurationRefresher.SetDirty(System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan})
member.summary: Sets the cached value for key-values registered for refresh as dirty. A random delay is added before the cached value is marked as dirty to reduce potential throttling in case multiple instances refresh at the same time.
member.param: Maximum delay before the cached value is marked as dirty. Default value is 30 seconds.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.AzureAppConfiguration.IConfigurationRefresherProvider
member.summary: An interface used to retrieve refresher instances for App Configuration.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.AzureAppConfiguration.IConfigurationRefresherProvider.Refreshers
member.summary: List of instances of for App Configuration.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.AzureAppConfiguration.IOfflineCache.Export(Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.AzureAppConfiguration.AzureAppConfigurationOptions,System.String)
member.summary: Export Azure App Configuration data to an offline cache.

The data to cache for later usage.

member.summary: Key name for cached data

member.summary: Key name for signature

member.summary: Key name for cached data scope

member.name: F:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.AzureAppConfiguration.OfflineFileCache._scopeToken
member.summary: An opaque token representing a query for Azure App Configuration data. The token is used to test if cached data matches the request being issued to Azure App Configuration.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.AzureAppConfiguration.OfflineFileCache.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.AzureAppConfiguration.OfflineFileCacheOptions)
member.summary: A cache used for storing Azure App Configuration data using the file system. Supports encryption of the stored data.
member.param: Options dictating the behavior of the offline cache. If the options are null or the encryption keys are omitted, they will be derived from the store's connection string. is required unless the application is running inside of an Azure App Service instance, in which case it can be populated automatically.

member.summary: An implementation of that caches the data in the file system.

member.summary: Options for controlling the behavior of an .

member.summary: The file path to use for persisting cached data.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.AzureAppConfiguration.OfflineFileCacheOptions.Key
member.summary: Key used for encrypting data stored in the offline file cache.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.AzureAppConfiguration.OfflineFileCacheOptions.IV
member.summary: Initilization vector used for encryption within the offline file cache.
